entry.title: Javascript developer
entry.text:
Front-end Developer with knowledge of HTMl, CSS, JavaScript, some Photoshop
 
Remote Project Fixed Job: ~8hrs 
Hourly rate: $10-25/hr 

Team is small, English-speaking. Knowledge of English at intermediate level and above is welcome.

Project Description:
- Create 3 html pages using bootstrap

Requirements:
- 2+ years of software development in HTML & CSS
‚ÅÉ 1 year of software development in vanilla JavaScript 
- Eagerness to constantly improve and learn new skills.
- Experience using Ticketing tools.
‚ÅÉ Ability to decompose specs efficiently
